welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cudahy, where small-town charm meets big city opportunities! Known for its scenic parks and bustling downtown area, we invite you to explore and discover the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for low-cost carriers such as Southwest Airlines and Frontier Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and domestic flights for airlines such as Aeromexico, Air Canada, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for airlines such as Allegiant Air, Delta Air Lines, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Hawaiian Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, Copa Airlines, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines such as Air France, British Airways, and Emirates.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Southwest and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as Delta and United.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport offers services for general aviation and private aircrafts.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Cable Airport is used for commercial flights and charters.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
